name: Gravity Run (itch) (Sushant)
description:
Run , dodge , control gravity. How long can you survive?

This game was made for mini jam 107 the jam was 72 hours long but i made this in 12 hours

i know game very bad but trust me i will make need for speed one day......

controls:

Arrow keys to move and space to on/off gravity

The html file might not work properly so download for good experience

Tell your score in comments!!!!
